abstract: Would it be feasible to replace a business Web site with a Google+ page?
snippet: Would it be feasible to replace a business Web site with a Google+ page?
lead_paragraph: In my This Week in Small Business post on Monday, I quoted a social media expert, Krista Neher, who had written a blog post about why businesses should be using Google+. As a follow-up, I went back to Ms. Neher with a few questions.

headline.main: Drilling Down: How Businesses Use Google+
